definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: "Well, it isn't as interesting, " said Hurstwood.
sentences.chinese: “哎，也不如芝加哥有意思，”赫斯渥說。

sentences.english: You have a layover in Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 你要在芝加哥作短暫停留。

sentences.english: When he was not at the firm, Obama was teaching at the University of Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 他不在事務所的時候，就會去芝加哥大學講課。

sentences.english: The Chicago Bull bought a new guard.
sentences.chinese: 芝加哥公牛隊新僱了一名後衛。

sentences.english: Addams founded Hull House on Halsted Street in Chicago in 1889.
sentences.chinese: 赫爾館於1889年在芝加哥的特德街成立。

sentences.english: Chicago had a free-and-easy atmosphere much like that of Storyville.
sentences.chinese: 芝加哥有一種很象斯托裏維爾那樣自由和放縱的氣氛。

sentences.english: The Chicago Sun-Times reports that Novak's condition is dire.
sentences.chinese: 芝加哥陽光時代雜誌報道說諾瓦科的健康狀況很糟。

sentences.english: The evil Decepticons have set their sights on Chicago, where Carly is trapped.
sentences.chinese: 邪惡的霸天虎已經盯上了芝加哥，卡莉被圍困的地方。

sentences.english: William. Nature's Metropolis: Chicago and the Great West. W. W. Norton & Company, 1991.
sentences.chinese: 一部關於芝加哥如何成爲西部大都市的重要研究。

sentences.english: Chicago endured blizzard conditions and thundersnow, along with half a meter of snow accumulation.
sentences.chinese: 芝加哥處於暴風雪和雷暴天氣，會有半米左右的積雪。

sentences.english: I have sailed 333 miles in the Chicago Mackinac Regatta Race .
sentences.chinese: 我已航行三百三十三英里在芝加哥麥基諾帆船賽。

sentences.english: In 1985, Obama moved to Chicago, where he became a community organizer with a church-based group.
She worked briefly for Merrill Lynch in Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 她曾在芝加哥爲美林集團短期工作過。

sentences.english: Last year, Refco was the largest provider of customer transaction volume to the CME.
sentences.chinese: 去年，瑞富在芝加哥商品交易所的客戶成交量最大。

sentences.english: Through the system of lakes and rivers, Chicago was well connected to all of the American states.
sentences.chinese: 透過河湖系統，芝加哥與美國各州緊緊聯繫。

sentences.english: In 1983, the Sociology Department at Chicago offered me a joint appointment.
sentences.chinese: 1983年，芝加哥大學社會學系給我一份邀請。

definition: St Louis, large city in eastern Missouri
Minneapolis, a nameplace in the USA, notably in Minnesota
pinyin: Ming2 ni2 a1 bo1 li4 si1

definition: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania/abbr. for 費拉德爾菲亞|费拉德尔菲亚[Fei4 la1 de2 er3 fei1 ya4]
